Name: ArcGIS Map Image Layer
Description: The Map Image Layer from URL app is the most basic Map app for the ArcGIS Runtime SDK for .NET using an ArcGISMapImageLayer basemap from an ArcGIS Online service URL. It shows how to add a MapView in the layout XML of the activity, create a Map Image Layer from an ArcGIS Online service URL and bind that to a Basemap. The Basemap is used to create a Map which is used inside of the MapView. By default, this map supports basic zooming and panning operations.
